schema.name: Healthyfied Taragon Buttered Tuna

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your ingredients: Soften the butter to room temperature, grind the pepper, and measure the garlic powder and dried tarragon.
Season the sashimi tuna evenly with the ground pepper and garlic powder.
In a pan, melt the unsalted butter over medium heat, then add the seasoned tuna to the pan.
Cook the tuna for about 2 minutes on each side for a medium-rare finish or adjust according to your preferred doneness.
Sprinkle the dried tarragon over the tuna in the last minute of cooking to infuse it with flavor.
Serve immediately and enjoy your Healthyfied Tarragon Buttered Tuna.

schema.description: Dive into a heart-healthy culinary adventure with this Healthyfied Tarragon Buttered Tuna. Perfect for those following a high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. This recipe brings together the richness of butter, the spicy hint of black pepper and garlic, and the unique aroma of tarragon to give you a flavorsome meal that doesn't skimp on your health goals. Ideal for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes without compromising on taste.
